mapper.insert: insert into reserver (non_name, non_email, non_pw, rsvr_time) values (#{non_name}, #{non_email}, #{non_pw}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT rsvr_code FROM reserver WHERE non_name = #{non_name} ORDER BY rsvr_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT rsvr_code FROM reserver WHERE u_code = #{u_code} ORDER BY rsvr_time DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into reserver (u_code, rsvr_time) values (#{u_code}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reserver WHERE u_code = #{u_code} AND rsvr_time >= CONCAT(#{yearAndMonth}, '-01') AND rsvr_time <= LAST_DAY(CONCAT(#{yearAndMonth}, '-01') )
select * from reserver where u_code = ${u_code} ORDER BY rsvr_time DESC
